Key Features of Dah Sing Travel Insurance
The coverage of Dah Sing Travel Insurance is extensive and its key features are as follows:
Enjoy 14-day automatic extension of the policy for free
In case the insured journey is extended due to reasons beyond your control, you can enjoy a 14-day automatic extension of the policy for free.
Cover leisure or amateur activities
Cover leisure or amateur activities during your trip which includes skiing, water skiing, rafting, parachuting, bungee jump, scuba diving, rock climbing and mountaineering
Special Coverage for Camera
In the event of accidental loss of or damage to your camera during the insured journey. you enjoy a special cover for the camera with up to the maximum benefit HK$7,500.
Family Plan Available
For a premium of 2, you can enjoy the coverage for maximum 2 parents and unlimited number of legal children aged under 18.
How to make a claim?
Claim requests must be made within 30 days from the date of loss through the following methods.
Step 1
Download and complete the claim form and direct credit authorisation form
Step 2
Provide relevant supporting documents
Step 3
Submit claim form And supporting documents through the following ways:
Fax：2232 5984
Email：dsiclaim@dahsing.com
Postal Address：2703, 27/F, Island Place Tower, 510 King's Road, North Point, Hong Kong
Online submission
For any request of Original documents, they have to be posted to the above Postal Address within the requisite timeframe.
Frequently Asked Questions
Does Dah Sing Travel Insurance cover COVID-19 coronavirus?
Yes, Dah Sing Travel Insurance covers COVID-19 coronavirus.
What are the key features of Dah Sing Travel Insurance?
Dah Sing Travel Insurance does not have any deductible, and it provides a 14-day free and automatic extension coverage period. Moreover, it covers leisure sports, personal belongings, cameras, etc.
Is there an age limit for Dah Sing Travel Insurance?
Yes, Dah Sing Travel Insurance has an age limit. Single trip cover: 6 weeks old to 85 years old. Annual trip cover: 6 weeks old to 65 years old
Can I purchase Dah Sing Travel Insurance for overseas study?
No, you cannot, as the coverage of Dah Sing Travel Insurance only lasts for a maximum of 182 days so it does not cover the entire study period. You should purchase overseas study insurance for comprehensive coverage.
